title: Cranberry Pecan Cheese Ball

ingredients.content: 110 g Cheddar cheese, cut in pieces

preparations.content: Place pecans in mixing bowl and chop <b>2 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place Cheddar, cranberries and thyme in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>.

Add cream cheese and mix <b>5-10 sec/speed 7<b> or until fully combined. Transfer mixture to the center of a piece of cling film. Gather up sides of cling film, shape into a ball and chill in fridge for 30 minutes.
Roll chilled cheese ball in reserved chopped pecans to fully coat. Store in fridge until ready to serve.

hintsAndTricks: Serve with crackers, toast points or crudit√©s.
Instead of one large cheese ball, try making several smaller cheese balls.
Use roasted pecans for a richer, nuttier flavour.
